DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect multiple dos rifampin single-dose PK BMS 986141 parameter like Cmax , AUC ( INF ) , AUC ( 0-T ) , AUC ( 0-144h )
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Effect Rifampin Single-dose Pharmacokinetics ( PK ) BMS-986141 Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: 1 . Signed Informed Consent 2 . Healthy men woman ( child bear potential ) determine medical history , surgical history , physical examination , vital sign , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , clinical laboratory test include coagulation parameter . 3 . Subjects body mass index 18 32 kg/m2 , inclusive . 4 . Women participant must document proof childbearing potential . 5 . Men sexually active WOCBP must agree follow instruction method ( ) contraception duration treatment plus 5 halflives Rifampin ( 1 day ) plus 90 day total 91 day posttreatment completion . 1 . Acute chronic medical illness , subject bleed diathesis , gastroesophageal reflux disease , gastrointestinal ulcer , hepatic disease , coagulation disorder , dyspepsia reliant contact lenses vision duration study treatment 2 day discontinuation study treatment ( eyeglasses allow ) . 2 . History nausea , diarrhoea , recent surgery , use tobacco nicotine containing product , drug alcohol use , periodontal disease , hemorrhoid rectal bleed recent blood donation . 3 . Prior exposure BMS986141 prothrombin complex , investigational product placebo within 4 week study treatment start , prescription counter drug except clear BMS clinical monitor . 4 . History hypersensitivity BMS 986141 , rifampin , rifamycins related compound , component formulation 5 . Evidence organ dysfunction clinically significant deviation normal physical examination , vital sign , ECGs , clinical laboratory determination beyond consistent target population
